dt: {bc}a dog (such as a border collie) used to tend, drive, or guard {a_link|sheep}

shortdef: a dog (such as a border collie) used to tend, drive, or guard sheep

dt: {bc}any of a breed of hardy dogs developed in Belgium especially for herding sheep and having abundant long straight black hair with a dense undercoat

shortdef: any of a breed of hardy dogs developed in Belgium especially for herding sheep and having abundant long straight black hair with a dense undercoat

dt: {bc}any of a breed of tailless dogs developed in England and having a profuse blue-gray and white coat

shortdef: any of a breed of tailless dogs developed in England and having a profuse blue-gray and white coat

dt: {bc}any of a breed of small heavy-coated dogs developed in the Shetland Islands that resemble miniature collies

shortdef: any of a breed of small heavy-coated dogs developed in the Shetland Islands that resemble miniature collies
